title: Dog With Phone
description:
Cardstock.

Ms. Magdalene J.H. Lam, the female tenant of this residence, acquired this magnificent piece pre-union. Ms. Lam chanced upon this print at an artistsâ€™ flea, which she frequents on the weekends because she can never sit still or be at home. The irony of this print is twofold: how can a dog ever answer the phone; and who even uses landlines anymore? 

This piece is an homage to the trailblazing social media application of the 2010s: Vine, which planted the seeds of this exquisite print.
